desc: A tutorial on version control using git and GitHub.

desc: An introduction to Docker and other containerization technologies.

desc: An introduction to the R programming language.

desc: An introduction to the Python programming language.

title: Software Testing for Scientists
desc: An overview of software testing practices.

title: Science: Open for All
desc: How to practice and promote an inclusionary, welcoming open science.

desc: An introduction to the Jupyter ecosystem and its applications.

title: Numerical computing for neuroimaging
desc: An introduction to the Numpy numerical computing package and associated neuroimaging tools.

desc: A tutorial on creating and distributing Python packages.

desc: An overview of matplotlib and associated packages for visualization in Python.

desc: An introduction to image processing in Python using the scikit-image package.

title: Data manipulation in pandas
desc: A tutorial on representation and manipulation of data in Python using pandas.

desc: A review of tools and techniques for performance optimization of Python code.

desc: An introduction to packages for building and applying neural network models in Python.

desc: An overview of ethical considerations and issues relevant to neuroscientific research.

desc: An introduction to machine learning in Python using scikit-learn.

desc: An introduction to the BIDS ecosystem: The BIDS spec, BIDS-Apps, and other applications.

desc: Overview of open neuroscience tools and services developed at the Center for Reproducible Neuroscience (e.g., OpenNeuro, fMRIPrep, etc.).

desc: An introduction to back-end and front-end web development.

desc: This tutorial introduces tool for constructing reproducible workflows for fMRI preprocessing and analysis.
